text:
@TeamTrump @realDonaldTrump Burying the dead #COVID19 bodies with lies. Taking credit for #science when he claimed it was a hoax.

Meanwhile #Barr is scheduled to appear b4 Congress, tomorrow:
#PortlandProtest #PortlandKidnappings #PortlandMoms #PortlandStrong
#DCProtest #SeattleProtest
Will he show up?
